sentences.sContent: There was mockery now in those piercing blue eyes.
sentences.sCn: 那双敏锐的蓝眼睛里流露出讥讽。

sentences.sContent: She felt foolish and unsure under his piercing gaze .
sentences.sCn: 在他洞悉一切的注视下，她觉得自己很愚昧，没有自信。

sentences.sContent: He gave her a piercing look .
sentences.sCn: 他向她投去锐利的目光。

synos.tran: 刺穿的；敏锐的；尖刻的；打动人心的

phrases.pCn: 冲孔模；冲缺口模；冲厂孔模

words.tran: 刺穿；洞察；响彻；深深地打动

trans.tranCn: 冷得刺骨的； 敏锐的
trans.tranOther: someone with piercing eyes is looking at you and seems to know what you are thinking
